thread.title: Noem’s plan to cut $17 million from maintenance and repairs is ‘shortsighted,’ regent says
thread.title_full: Noem’s plan to cut $17 million from maintenance and repairs is ‘shortsighted,’ regent says

author: Makenzie Huber Southdakotasearchlight.com
title: Noem’s plan to cut $17 million from maintenance and repairs is ‘shortsighted,’ regent says
text:
PIERRE —Gov. Kristi Noem’s proposal to cut the state’s maintenance and repair budget by $17 million is “shortsighted,” a former Cabinet member said at a state board meeting Thursday.
Noem is proposing to fund the maintenance and repair of state buildings at 1.25 percent of replacement value instead of 1.75 percent.
